TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit FormParameter extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter

summary.span: 将 HTTP 请求 字段的值绑定到参数对象。

span.span: Binds the value of an HTTP request field to a parameter object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用类中的窗体变量的值绑定到在参数化的查询或命令中使用的参数的集合。You can use the class to bind the value of a form variable in the collection to a parameter used in a parameterized query or command. 将数据绑定到参数的控件可能会引发异常，如果指定但没有相应的窗体变量进行传递。Controls that bind data to the parameter might throw an exception if a is specified but no corresponding form variable is passed. 如果没有对应值传递的窗体变量，它们还可能会显示任何数据。They might also display no data if the form variable is passed with no corresponding value. 设置若要避免这种情况下，在适当的位置。Set the to avoid these situations where appropriate. 类提供了属性，用于标识要绑定到除继承的窗体变量的名称类。The class provides the property, which identifies the name of the form variable to bind to, in addition to those inherited from the class. > [!IMPORTANT] > 不会验证传递的任何方式; 中的窗体元素的值使用的原始值。The does not validate the value passed by the form element in any way; it uses the raw value. 在大多数情况下，您可以验证的值处理事件，如使用数据源控件之前`Selecting`， `Updating`， `Inserting`，或`Deleting`正在使用的数据源控件公开的事件。In most cases you can validate the value of the before it is used by a data source control by handling an event, such as the `Selecting`, `Updating`, `Inserting`, or `Deleting` event exposed by the data source control you are using. 如果参数的值未通过验证测试，则可以取消数据操作，通过设置关联的属性类到`true`。If the value of the parameter does not pass your validation tests, you can cancel the data operation by setting the property of the associated class to `true`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将数据插入数据库使用控件和一个简单的 ASP.NET 网页。The following code example demonstrates how to insert data into a database using the control and a simple ASP.NET Web page. 数据表中的当前数据显示在控件。The current data in the data table is displayed in the control. 您可以通过输入中的值添加新记录控件，然后单击按钮。You can add new records by entering values in the controls and clicking the button. 单击该按钮，将指定的值插入到数据库，并进行刷新。When the button is clicked, the specified values are inserted into the database, and the is refreshed. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_24sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_24sql/CS/sql24cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_24sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_24sql/VB/sql24vb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个使用创建的对象构造函数初始化它的所有属性的默认值。A object created with the constructor is initialized with default values for all its properties. 初始化为。The is initialized to . 此外，属性初始化为，则属性初始化为，则属性初始化为，和初始化属性为 null (`Nothing`在 Visual Basic 中)。Additionally, the property is initialized to , the property is initialized to , the property is initialized to , and the property is initialized to null (`Nothing` in Visual Basic). ## Examples > [!IMPORTANT] > 不会验证传递的任何方式; 中的窗体元素的值使用的原始值。The does not validate the value passed by the form element in any way; it uses the raw value. 在大多数情况下，您可以验证的值处理事件，如使用数据源控件之前`Selecting`， `Updating`， `Inserting`，或`Deleting`正在使用的数据源控件公开的事件。In most cases, you can validate the value of the before it is used by a data source control by handling an event, such as the `Selecting`, `Updating`, `Inserting`, or `Deleting` event exposed by the data source control you are using. 如果参数的值未通过验证测试，则可以取消数据操作，通过设置关联的属性类到`true`。If the value of the parameter does not pass your validation tests, you can cancel the data operation by setting the property of the associated class to `true`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 尝试绑定到窗体变量每次调用方法。The attempts to bind to the form variable every time the method is called. `context`参数由方法以从请求中检索指定的窗体字段的值。The `context` parameter is used by the method to retrieve the value of the specified form field from the request. `control`参数将被忽略。The `control` parameter is ignored.

member this.FormField : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置参数绑定到的窗体变量的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the form variable that the parameter binds to.

value.span: 标识作为参数绑定目标的窗体变量的字符串。

span.span: A string that identifies the form variable to which the parameter binds.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 标识的名称/值对中传递集合。The identifies a name/value pair that is passed in the collection. 虽然属性标识的对，名称在运行时绑定到其相应的值。While the property identifies the name of the pair, the binds to its corresponding value at run time. 如果预期的窗体变量的字符串名称/值对不传递给在集合中，ASP.NET 网页方法将参数绑定到的值属性，如果将其设置。If the expected form variable string name/value pair is not passed to the ASP.NET Web page in the collection, the method binds the parameter to the value of the property, if it is set. 如果未设置，则方法无法将参数绑定到一个值。If the is not set, the method fails to bind the parameter to a value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何显示使用的已筛选的数据控件和一个中间层业务对象中检索数据和控件来显示结果。The following code example demonstrates how to display filtered data using an control and a to retrieve data from a middle-tier business object and a control to display the results. 代码示例组成、 一个控件，控件和一个提交按钮。The code example consists of a , a control, the control, and a submit button. 默认情况下，填入一个 Northwind Traders 员工的名称。By default, the is populated with the name of one of the Northwind Traders employees. 显示有关中的名称所标识的雇员信息。The displays information about the employee identified by the name in the . 若要检索有关另一个雇员的数据，请输入中的雇员的完整名称，然后单击按钮。To retrieve data on another employee, enter the full name of the employee in the and click the button. 属性指定一个表达式，用于筛选数据来检索。The property specifies an expression used to filter the data retrieved by the . 此属性使用到中包含的参数进行求值的参数占位符集合。This property uses parameter placeholders that are evaluated to the parameters contained in the collection. 在此示例中，为参数占位符绑定到的值控件。In this example, the parameter placeholder is a bound to the value of the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_9#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_9/CS/objds9cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_9#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_9/VB/objds9vb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例显示了前面的代码示例使用的中间层业务对象。The following code example shows the middle-tier business object that the previous code example uses. 此示例包含两个基本类：`EmployeeLogic`类封装业务逻辑和`NorthwindEmployee`类是包含仅与加载和保存的数据层的数据所需的基本功能的模型类。This example consists of two basic classes: The `EmployeeLogic` class encapsulates business logic, and the `NorthwindEmployee` class is a model class that contains only the basic functionality required to load and persist data from the data tier. 为简单起见，`EmployeeLogic`类创建一组静态的数据，而不是从数据层中检索数据。For simplicity, the `EmployeeLogic` class creates a static set of data, rather than retrieving the data from a data tier. 也很有帮助的此示例中，因为此示例依赖于用户提供的 Northwind Traders 员工来演示筛选的完整名称。It is also helpful for this example, because the sample relies on the user to provide the full name of a Northwind Traders employee to demonstrate filtering. 有关完整的工作示例，必须编译，并使用提供的 ASP.NET 代码示例使用这些类。For a complete working example, you must compile and use these classes with the ASP.NET code examples provided. > [!IMPORTANT] > 不会验证传递的任何方式; 中的窗体元素的值使用的原始值。The does not validate the value passed by the form element in any way; it uses the raw value. 在大多数情况下，您可以验证的值处理事件，如使用数据源控件之前`Selecting`， `Updating`， `Inserting`，或`Deleting`正在使用的数据源控件公开的事件。In most cases, you can validate the value of the before it is used by a data source control by handling an event, such as the `Selecting`, `Updating`, `Inserting`, or `Deleting` event exposed by the data source control you are using. 如果参数的值未通过验证测试，则可以取消数据操作，通过设置关联的属性类到`true`。If the value of the parameter does not pass your validation tests, you can cancel the data operation by setting the property of the associated class to `true`. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_9#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_9/CS/northwindemployee9.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_9#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_9/VB/northwindemployee9.vb#2)]
